credit_line: Gift of Sara and Marc Benda
title: Ucieczka King Konga [King Kong Escapes]
provenance: Acquired from dealers, galleries and auction houses by Marc Benda.  Remained with Benda until 2010, when gifted to CHNDM.
description: On beige background, a plum gorilla with purple highlights and orange-and-yellow glowing eyes is diagonally arranged. In upper left, the inscriptions are, in brown: "japonski film fantastyczny / UCIECZKA KING KONGA / Rezyceria: Inoshira Honda / W rolach glownych: Rhodes Reason, Akira Takarada, / Linda Miller. Mie Hama / Produkja: Toho".
name: Poster
